title: Bond Physics Config Component
description: Configuration that defines the physics model for a Bond (Dynamic or Static).

physics_properties.title: Base Physics Properties
physics_properties.description: Defines the common physics-related properties for components and laws.

collapse_sensitive.description: Indicates if the object is affected by or triggers quantum collapse.

engine.description: The physics engine responsible for this object.

is_quantum.description: Indicates if the object has quantum properties.

bond_model.description: The physics model to apply to this bond.

dynamic_params.description: Parameters for the spring-damper model, used only if bond_model is 'Dynamic'.
dynamic_params.title: BondPhysicsConfigDynamicParams

static_params.description: Parameters for the associative model, used only if bond_model is 'Static'.
static_params.title: BondPhysicsConfigStaticParams
